items.headline: U.S. stock futures flat as investors digest ongoing tech selloff
items.summary_en: U.S. stock futures were little changed late Monday, following another brutal week for tech stocks.

items.headline: These might be the winners from the latest round of Chinese new year AI launches

items.headline: Hegseth reportedly considering severe penalty on Anthropic as negotiations stall
